item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite notched their third straight winning session Thursday. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Friday.

item.title: Investors should take a look at 'countertrend' stocks right now, Katie Stockton says
item.description: The Fairlead Strategies founder discussed her market outlook on CNBC's "Power Lunch."

item.title: Tapestry shares more than doubled in 6 months, and one investor thinks gains could be limited from here
item.description: Sylvia Jablonski, Defiance ETFs co-founder and CEO, said Tapestry has been relying on price cuts to help drive its growth over the past few years.

item.title: Here's what Wall Street is looking for in Amazon's fourth-quarter earnings report
item.description: Many major Wall Street firms are bullish on Amazon's fourth-quarter results.

item.title: These bonds get investors in on stadium action — and provide solid tax-free income
item.description: As Americans gear up for the 2025 Super Bowl, they may not be aware that they can invest in bonds that help make those stadiums a reality.
